homeHeader.title: Business Setup in Sharjah Free Zone Made Easy — Quick, Complaint, and Cost-Effective
homeHeader.description: Official procedures, heavy expenses, and tough regulations can make starting a business a real challenge. With One Nexuz, setting up a Sharjah Free Zone business becomes simple — low-cost licenses, flexible visa options, and easy access to air, sea, and land transport hubs. Set up your business in Sharjah’s free zone without the hassle. With One Nexuz by your side, your business will be operational in days!

leftSection_1.title: Why Choose Sharjah Free Zones for Business Setup
leftSection_1.description: Sharjah Free Zones offer an ideal balance of affordability, strategic location, and diverse business activities. With streamlined processes and investor-friendly regulations, they make setup faster, more transparent, and cost-effective.

items.title: Gain Freedom With 100% Foreign Ownership
items.subTitle: Gain Freedom With 100% Foreign Ownership
items.description: Traditional business setups often rely on local sponsors, limiting control and independence. Sharjah Free Zones eliminate this restriction by offering complete foreign ownership, giving entrepreneurs and investors full authority to manage and expand their businesses on their terms.

items.title: Expand Globally, Unlock New Trade Routes, and Boost Your Market Reach
items.subTitle: Expand Globally, Unlock New Trade Routes, and Boost Your Market Reach
items.description: Breaking into global markets is easier with Sharjah’s strategic location and world-class infrastructure. Businesses benefit from direct access to international airports, busy seaports, and regional road networks — making Sharjah a natural hub for trade, logistics, and global expansion.

items.title: Slash Setup Cost, Speed Up Licensing, and Scale Without Limits
items.subTitle: Slash Setup Cost, Speed Up Licensing, and Scale Without Limits
items.description: Unnecessary delays and hidden expenses can hinder growth. Sharjah Free Zones provide transparent fee structures, quick licensing, flexible visa options, and scalable facilities — helping businesses lower costs, launch faster, and expand with confidence.

items.title: Launch Any Venture, Explore Diverse Business Activities, Grow in a Free Zone
items.subTitle: Launch Any Venture, Explore Diverse Business Activities, Grow in a Free Zone
items.description: From media and e-commerce to consultancy, services, trading, and manufacturing, Sharjah Free Zones cater to a wide variety of industries. This diversity ensures that whatever your business idea, you’ll find the right framework and support to launch, grow, and succeed.

leftSection_3.title: One Nexuz Simplifies Choosing the Right Sharjah Free Zone Company Structure
leftSection_3.description: Secure business success from day one by choosing the best-fit legal structure.

items.title: Free Zone Establishment
items.description: Ideal for freelancers, solopreneurs, and remote businesses, an FZE offers single shareholder 100% ownership.

items.title: Free Zone Company
items.description: Well-suited for startups, partnerships, or small businesses, an FZC provides ownership to over two shareholders.

items.title: Branch of a Foreign Company
items.description: Perfect for businesses seeking expansion, this company structure empowers you to register a subsidiary in Sharjah FZ.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: How long does it take to set up a business in Sharjah Free Zone?
items.answer: It usually takes 3 to 5 working days, depending on your location, document readiness, and desired licenses.

items.question: What documents are required to register a company in the Sharjah Free Zone?
items.answer: You’ll need a copy of your passport and visa, a passport-sized photo, and a brief business activity description. Depending on your business activity, you may also need to provide a business plan.

items.question: How many visas can I get with my Sharjah license?
items.answer: You can typically secure 3-6 visas per license, depending on the free zone you select.

items.question: Do I need to be physically present in the UAE to register my business?
items.answer: No! Most free zones allow remote setup, providing you with a fast, paperless registration process.

items.question: Can One Nexuz assist me in setting up my business bank account?
items.answer: Absolutely! Our business consultants help you create a corporate business account to streamline your finances.
